tool_description: Automatically detect and filter offensive, inappropriate, or profane content within text data. With this API, you can seamlessly integrate profanity filtering capabilities into your applications, platforms, or services, enabling you to maintain a safe and respectful environment for your users.
name: Bad Words Profanity Filter
title: Bad Words Profanity Filter

api_list.name: Filter Bad Words
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bad-words-profanity-filter.p.rapidapi.com/filter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bad-words-profanity-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
